General.Name: Oscar Mitra Sukses Sejahtera Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Oscar Mitra Sukses Sejahtera Tbk engages in the wholesale trading of household appliances and equipment in Indonesia. The company offers bedroom, living room, dining room, office, kitchen, outdoor, and home décor and lifestyle furniture. It also engages in the retail trading of glassware and plastic kitchen utensils; specialized carpets, rugs, and wall and floor coverings; and stone, clay, wood, bamboo, and textiles. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia.

2.Name: Ms. Stephanie Andriana Suhanda
2.Title: Chief Operational Officer, Corp. Sec. & Director
